Synopsis: Displays the elements of an ArrayList with optional type information.
Description: The Show-Array function displays each element of the provided ArrayList. Optionally, it can also show the type of each element.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
$myList = New-Object System.Collections.ArrayList
$myList.Add("Banana")
$myList.Add(3.14)
Show-Array -List $myList -WithType
# Output:
# Banana (Type: String)
# 3.14 (Type: Double)
